title: Sheet-Pan Lemon Garlic Salmon
description: A weeknight-friendly salmon dinner with blistered green beans and a punchy herb oil.
author: Morgan Rivera

steps.text: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C) and line a sheet pan with parchment.
Toss green beans with 1 tbsp olive oil, half the garlic, and half the lemon zest. Spread on pan.
Place salmon over beans. Stir remaining olive oil, garlic, zest, lemon juice, paprika, salt, and pepper. Brush over salmon.
Roast 15–18 minutes until salmon flakes. Top with dill and extra lemon.

tips: Swap green beans for asparagus when in season.
Leftovers become excellent cold salad over baby greens.
